lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic overpowered Rafael Nadal, 6-2, 6-3, Saturday to reach the Paris Masters final for the first time. He will face Gaël Monfils of France on Sunday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic overpowered Rafael Nadal, 6-2, 6-3, Saturday to reach the Paris Masters final for the first time. He will face Gaël Monfils of France on Sunday.
